imdb.plot outline: Amelia, Stefano, Marcello, Irene, four strangers who together form an explosive mix. Marcello, is the computer expert with an unmentionable secret; Irene, is the metalhead perpetually on the verge of dismissal; Amelia, is the bored librarian who aspires to something better and Stefano, is the beautiful and damned. A reshuffle the cards in the game of what seems like a typical fresco of young people struggling with the failures and choices in life comes something mysterious, sometimes supernatural, the persistent feeling of being followed, scrutinized, hunted. Between research, chases and daring escapes, nine episodes that will leave you in suspense.
imdb.title: You Can't Take It with You
akas: You Can't Take It with You (Italy)
